name: Get into Whitsunday holiday mode with an Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise on Sundowner
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Get into Whitsunday holiday mode with an Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise on Sundowner ===
Target for scroll anchors to achieve native browser bahaviour + possible enhancements like smooth scrolling
Get into Whitsunday holiday mode with an Airlie Beach Sunset Cruise on Sundowner
Unwind in the ambiance of a Whitsunday sunset, as you see in the evening from dusk to dark. Watch the lights of Airlie Beach while enjoying your favourite tipple from our fully licensed bar. Sundowner Cruises offers a relaxing social atmosphere for connecting with new friends and sharing experiences.
Sundowner is a fully covered, purpose built catamaran designed for socialising – a floating bar. Unlike a yacht, we have a flat surface and no trip hazards. There is ample room to move, and high heels are welcome.
A glass of sparkling or soft drink is included in your sunset cruise ticket price, and
is open throughout the cruise for you to purchase further drinks. Cash or card welcome. Sorry, no BYO.
Sundowner departs from Coral Sea Marina, North Village, which is only a short walk from the main street of Airlie Beach. Coral Sea Marina is a vibrant award winning marina which includes the Garden Bar & Bistro with uninterrupted views across the marina and Sorrento’s Restaurant & Bar located alongside the boardwalk in the North Village.
We circumnavigate Pioneer Bay and as we have very little draft we are able are able to get up close and personal to the many points of interest along the Airlie Beach coastline, and enjoy a bit of turtle spotting in Turtle Bay. After the sun sets, enjoy the lights of Airlie Beach at night, while we slowly make our way back to port.
Airlie Beach and the Whitsunday islands provide the perfect backdrop for our sunset cruises. Sundowner is also available in the afternoon for
for birthdays, corporate groups,
, hens and bucks parties, or any celebration.
FareHarbor calendar of item #568532
Sunset Cruises Every Day
$69.00 per adult (aged 15+) and includes a glass of sparkling for the adults and nibbles.
$59.00 per child (age 3 to 14) and includes a glass of soft drink/juice.
Children 2 and under travel free, but MUST hold an infants ticket as they must be on our manifest and count towards our total passenger limit.
Our nibbles consist of a simple platter of crackers, vege sticks, olives, sun-dried tomatoes, kabana, and dip, which are shared with all guests. Pringles are available to purchase on board.
Some items contain dairy or gluten. You are welcome to bring your own small nibbles along if you wish. We do recommend bringing something for kids to keep them happy during the 2 hour cruise.
We are fully licensed with a
We recommend you make a reservation for dinner after the cruise. We arrive back to port promptly at the advertised seasonal finish time.
Cruise & Dine Option
Did you know we also offer a Cruise & Dine package with Sorrento’s Restaurant and Bar at the marina?
It’s a delightful way to spend an evening, whether it’s for a special occasion, or just because.
Click here for more information
Click on the image below to view the gallery.

$69.00 per adult (aged 15+) and includes a glass of sparkling for the adults and nibbles.
$59.00 per child (age 3 to 14) and includes a glass of soft drink/juice.
For $149.00 per person, you can enjoy both our 2 hour sunset cruise with the usual inclusions, followed by a cocktail and 2-course meal afterwards at Sorrento’s.

name: A sunset cruise followed by a delicious dinner
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: A sunset cruise followed by a delicious dinner ===
Target for scroll anchors to achieve native browser bahaviour + possible enhancements like smooth scrolling
A sunset cruise followed by a delicious dinner
Join Sundowner Cruises on a pre-dinner Sunset Cruise around Pioneer Bay, followed by wonderful meal at Sorrentos Restaurant and Bar.
Welcoming couples and groups alike, if you book the Cruise & Dine experience, we will book an individual table to suit, whether you are wanting a romantic dinner for two or are part of a small group* celebrating a special occasion.
Cruise and Dine is available every day.
*If you are part of a group but booking individually, please let us know so that we can make the correct size table booking for your party.
2 hour sunset cruise, a glass of bubbles on arrival and nibbles platter, and
FareHarbor calendar of item #568583
Sorrento Restaurant and Bar
Warm and friendly atmosphere just a short 2 minute stroll from Sundowner’s jetty. Delicious, freshly prepared food, outstanding cocktails and a hand picked boutique wine list can all be enjoyed whilst overlooking the beautiful Coral Sea Marina. Indoor and outdoor seating is available.
A separate table is booked for each Cruise & Dine booking, so please advise us if you are travelling with others on a separate booking.
A cocktail of your choice
Two course meal: choose either entree & main, or main & dessert
Cruise & Dine Menu
NB. Kids may join you at the restaurant, but must purchase a separate kids cruise ticket and parents pay for the kids meals direct to the restaurant. Infants must also have a (free) cruise ticket, and please advise if you intend to bring a pram.
Whitsunday / Airlie Beach Cruises
Cruise and Dine Airlie Beach
Groups & Private Charters
Corporate Cruises and Events
